s.text: Because the various regulations, forms, and rules that are being amended by this rulemaking already possessed OMB control numbers, OMB did not assign new control numbers.

Pursuant to section 801(a)(2)(A) of title 5, United States Code, this is our report on a major rule promulgated by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), entitled "Disclosure of Accounting Policies for Derivative Financial Instruments and Derivative Commodity Instruments" (RIN: 3235-AG42/RIN: 3235-AG77).

Pursuant to section 801(a)(2)(A) of title 5, United States Code, this is our report on a major rule promulgated by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), entitled "Disclosure of Accounting Policies for Derivative Financial Instruments and Derivative Commodity Instruments" (RIN: 3235-AG42/RIN: 3235-AG77).

Pursuant to section 801(a)(2)(A) of title 5, United States Code, this is our report on a major rule promulgated by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), entitled "Disclosure of Accounting Policies for Derivative Financial Instruments and Derivative Commodity Instruments" (RIN: 3235-AG42/RIN: 3235-AG77).
Because the various regulations, forms, and rules that are being amended by this rulemaking already possessed OMB control numbers, OMB did not assign new control numbers.
The Commission believes that the benefits from the more complete disclosure and increased market efficiency are expected to outweigh the related costs.
